description: The standard a2 script module collection.
name: a2.modules
news:
* ExplorerCreateFile 0.6: create base64 PNG & JPG!
* UniFormat 0.5: Fixed self triggering/replacing
  The "flipped" set for instance has replacements that also appear in keys!
  Which used to invalidate the first replacement..
* orc_tool 0.1.2: added option for backup method
